channel.title: The Diseased[Neutral Killer](A silly-ish class)
channel.description:
#Note: Just because I said this class is "silly" doesn't mean I don't think it could work in Throne of Lies, the mechanics just seem a little silly, and perhaps it would have to be restricted to a more chaotic or silly gamemode
#The Diseased **At Death's Door(Passive)** - You will die the night after receiving this class **Horrid Stench(Passive)** - You are immune to occupation **Sneeze(Day)** - Sneeze on a player, they will not perform their day ability - Infinite uses **Infect(Night)** - Convert another player into **The Diseased**, your class will cease to be **The Diseased** once you have done this, unless your original class was **The Diseased**
Objective: See the disease continue to the last 2 players
Notes: You can only win if your disease reaches the final 2, the other Diseased player will also win If you die and you did not infect anyone, the disease has lost and so have you The "Hot Potato" aspect of this class may make it less fun for the original Diseased, so something could need adding there

item.title: The Diseased[Neutral Killer](A silly-ish class)
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
JammySplodge:

Infect(Night) - Convert another player into The Diseased, your class will cease to be The Diseased once you have done this, unless your original class was The Diseased

“Hey, I was The Diseased last night, The Diseased is now Player X, imprison them.”
If the person is not important, then they will be imprisoned and lose.

Also, Infect does not pierce Conversion Immunity, so it is a bit underpowered, as there need to be only 2 unconvertables for the goal to be unreachable, and one blunder(especially early) and you are dead.
